heading:
Build for
open
desc: We build tools to help make the open and equitable choice the easy choice, and the easy choice the norm.

heading:
Problems into
partnerships
desc: We form close partnerships with librarians and advocates to co-design just systems for open access, open data, and open research.

heading:
Ideals into
reality
desc: We are anchored and inspired by librarianship’s core values. Their values are our values, and our products aim to realize them.

heading:
Joy in
action
desc: We don’t let the difficulty of the world and the rigor of our work get in the way of our agility, playfulness, and humanity.
